about.title: About Primis EduCare
about.subtitle: Empowering students worldwide to achieve their academic dreams through innovative education and personalized support.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class college preparation education that empowers students to reach their full potential and gain admission to their dream universities.

global.title: Global Reach
global.desc: Serving students from over 50 countries with our comprehensive online and in-person programs.

excellence.title: Academic Excellence
excellence.desc: Maintaining the highest standards in education with expert instructors and proven methodologies.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Leveraging cutting-edge technology and modern teaching methods for optimal learning outcomes.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do in supporting student success.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: We maintain the highest standards in education, ensuring every student receives world-class instruction and support.

personalized.title: Personalized Learning
personalized.desc: Every student is unique. We tailor our approach to match individual learning styles and goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We embrace new technologies and methodologies to enhance the learning experience.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Building a supportive community where students, instructors, and families work together toward success.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Dedicated professionals committed to your academic success.

sarah.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
sarah.bio: Former Harvard admissions officer with 15+ years of experience in college prep education.

david.bio: Innovation leader ensuring our platform delivers the best possible learning experience.

history.title: Our Journey
history.foundation: Founded with a mission to democratize access to quality college preparation education worldwide.
history.expansion: Expanded our program offerings and launched our innovative online learning platform.
history.innovation: Introduced AI-powered personalized learning and virtual classroom technologies.
history.recognition: Recognized as a leading college prep institution with over 10,000 successful students.
history.future: Continuing to innovate and expand our global reach to help even more students succeed.
